official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for surveys of skilled nursing and intermediate care facilities and civil penalties for deficiencies uncovered in such surveys, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to provide for inspections of skilled nursing facilities and intermediate care facilities in order to determine whether such facilities are in compliance with the requirements of the Act. Directs the Secretary to issue a citation which shall provide for a civil penalty to the operator of a facility which does not correct identified deficiencies.
